entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:12 a.m. MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -13.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 12:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow at times early in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
